entity.name: In Chicago, Trump calls the city an embarrassment to the US
entity.description: Donald Trump has opened his first visit to Chicago as president by disparaging the city as "embarrassing to us as a nation"

text:
@realDonaldTrump Shut up.  You tweet sounds like one from Philo T. Farnsworth.  Where are New York's respirators??
#coronavirus #Chicago #NewOrleans #dallas #upperwestside #LosAngeles #Miami #girlslikeus #melaninpoppin #blackgirlsrock #transgirlsrock #women #blackwomen https://t.co/ffqQQ9CaSb
